active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate whether continuous security education programs, as outlined in NIST SP 800-50, are more effective than one-time certifications in reducing secure coding vulnerabilities. Support arguments with evidence from SSDF practices (NIST SP 800-218), NIST CSF functions, and real-world breach case studies (e.g., injection vulnerabilities in Agile teams).
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
